name: CRITICAL METALS CORP.
govEntities: Export-Import Bank of the United States (EXIM Bank)
sampleDescriptions: Advocate for the growth of a critical minerals supply chain in the United States and with allies, including domestic capacity for the processing and refining of rare earth elements.
